issue.title: otvet.mail.ru

labels.name: Extra
labels.description: Issues, related to AdGuard Extra extension

labels.name: A: Problematic
labels.description: Issues, which cannot be resolved easily

issue.body:
Включите расширение AdGuard Extra в настройках программы.

---

Пользователям браузерного расширения нужно установить скрипт `AdGuard Extra`. Для этого понадобится браузерное расширение-скриптоприёмник `Tampermonkey`

Ссылка на `AdGuard Extra`
https://userscripts.adtidy.org/beta/adguard-extra/1.0/adguard-extra.user.js

После установки скрипта нужно будет зайти в настройки `Tampermonkey`, включить режим эксперта, переключить режим встраивания на `мгновенный` и перезапустить расширение:
![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/8361299/62641343-07248e00-b94c-11e9-9775-9854a7922889.png)

![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/8361299/62641299-f7a54500-b94b-11e9-8a83-885d89abbeec.png)

comment.body:

comment.body:
This issue has been automatically marked as stale because it has been open for 4 days with no activity.
Unfortunately, our resources are limited and we can not always take the time to respond to requests about websites that are not popular enough. The issue will be closed if no further activity occurs.
Please note, that AdGuard Filters is an open-source project that is used by different content blockers and we welcome contributions. If you have some technical knowledge about how websites work, you are welcome to create a pull request following [these instructions](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md).

comment.body:
This issue has been automatically marked as stale because it has been open for 4 days with no activity.
Unfortunately, our resources are limited and we can not always take the time to respond to requests about websites that are not popular enough. The issue will be closed if no further activity occurs.
Please note, that AdGuard Filters is an open-source project that is used by different content blockers and we welcome contributions. If you have some technical knowledge about how websites work, you are welcome to create a pull request following [these instructions](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md).

issue.title: clustrmaps.com
issue.body:
### Prerequisites

- [X] This site DOES NOT contains sexually explicit material, otherwise use [NSFW-specific form](./new?template=bug_report_NSFW.yml);
- [X] Filters were updated before reproducing an issue;
- [X] AdGuard product version is up-to-date;
- [X] Browser version is up-to-date;
- [X] If the site or app is broken, disabling AdGuard protection resolves an issue.

### What product do you use?

AdGuard DNS

### AdGuard version

NextDNS filter 

### What type of problem have you encountered?

Website or app doesn't work properly

### Which browser(s) do you use?

Firefox

### Which device do you use?

Mobile

### Where is the problem encountered?

https://clustrmaps.com/

### What filters do you have enabled?

AdGuard Base filter, AdGuard Mobile Ads filter, AdGuard Russian filter

### What Stealth Mode options do you have enabled?

_No response_

### Add your comment and screenshots

1.  Data brokers and people-search sites are a gross and deeply concerning industry, but they aren't explicitly tracking or advertising per se.

If we want to get our info removed from these sites/databases (and everyone should!), it's necessary to visit the site to do so - but we can't if your filter is blocking the entire site categorically.

2. Screenshots

<details><summary>Screenshot 1:</summary>

https://imgur.com/a/Przc1cx

</details>

<details><summary>Screenshot 2:</summary>

https://imgur.com/a/UzM0A2O

</details>

### Privacy

- [X] I agree to follow this condition

comment.body:
> I'm not sure if it should be unblocked. Description from their website (about their widget):
> 
> > Each visitor shows up as a dot on your map **with their current location**. **We keep track if they are a new or returning visitor.**
> 
> So, it looks like a tracker and it seems that it's used on many websites - https://publicwww.com/websites/%22clustrmaps.com%22/

Oh wow, not sure how I missed this. Makes sense now why it's blocked. Thanks so much for checking!

labels.name: Extra
labels.description: Issues, related to AdGuard Extra extension

labels.name: A: Problematic
labels.description: Issues, which cannot be resolved easily

issue.body:
Включите расширение AdGuard Extra в настройках программы.

---

Пользователям браузерного расширения нужно установить скрипт `AdGuard Extra`. Для этого понадобится браузерное расширение-скриптоприёмник `Tampermonkey`

Ссылка на `AdGuard Extra`
https://userscripts.adtidy.org/beta/adguard-extra/1.0/adguard-extra.user.js

После установки скрипта нужно будет зайти в настройки `Tampermonkey`, включить режим эксперта, переключить режим встраивания на `мгновенный` и перезапустить расширение:
![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/8361299/62641343-07248e00-b94c-11e9-9775-9854a7922889.png)

![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/8361299/62641299-f7a54500-b94b-11e9-8a83-885d89abbeec.png)

comment.body: Не повторяется, включите также русский фильтр.

comment.body:
This issue has been automatically marked as stale because it has been open for 4 days with no activity.
Unfortunately, our resources are limited and we can not always take the time to respond to requests about websites that are not popular enough. The issue will be closed if no further activity occurs.
Please note, that AdGuard Filters is an open-source project that is used by different content blockers and we welcome contributions. If you have some technical knowledge about how websites work, you are welcome to create a pull request following [these instructions](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md).

This issue has been automatically marked as stale because it has been open for 10 days with no activity.
Unfortunately, our resources are limited and we can not always take the time to respond to requests about websites that are not popular enough. The issue will be closed if no further activity occurs.
Please note, that AdGuard Filters is an open-source project that is used by different content blockers and we welcome contributions. If you have some technical knowledge about how websites work, you are welcome to create a pull request following [these instructions](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md).

comment.body:
This issue has been automatically marked as stale because it has been open for 4 days with no activity.
Unfortunately, our resources are limited and we can not always take the time to respond to requests about websites that are not popular enough. The issue will be closed if no further activity occurs.
Please note, that AdGuard Filters is an open-source project that is used by different content blockers and we welcome contributions. If you have some technical knowledge about how websites work, you are welcome to create a pull request following [these instructions](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md).

issue.title: yandex.ru

labels.name: Extra
labels.description: Issues, related to AdGuard Extra extension

labels.name: A: Problematic
labels.description: Issues, which cannot be resolved easily

issue.body:
### ВНИМАНИЕ

Пользователям программы для `Windows`, `macOS` или `Android` нужно включить расширение `AdGuard Extra` в настройках программы.

---

Пользователям браузерного расширения нужно установить [расширение AdGuard Extra](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdGuardExtra#how-to-install-adguard-extra) либо скрипт `AdGuard Extra`(этот вариант может не везде срабатыавать). 

<details><summary>Установка скрипта  "AdGuard Extra" в расширение "Tampermonkey"  :</summary>

Для установки скрипта понадобится браузерное расширение-скриптоприёмник `Tampermonkey`

Ссылка на `AdGuard Extra`
https://userscripts.adtidy.org/beta/adguard-extra/1.0/adguard-extra.user.js

После установки скрипта нужно будет зайти в настройки `Tampermonkey`, включить режим эксперта, переключить режим встраивания на `мгновенный` и перезапустить расширение:
![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/8361299/62641343-07248e00-b94c-11e9-9775-9854a7922889.png)

![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/8361299/62641299-f7a54500-b94b-11e9-8a83-885d89abbeec.png)

</details>

Browser extension users should to install `AdGuard Extra` script into `Tampermonkey` extension.

comment.body:
This issue has been automatically marked as stale because it has been open for 10 days with no activity.
Unfortunately, our resources are limited and we can not always take the time to respond to requests about websites that are not popular enough. The issue will be closed if no further activity occurs.
Please note, that AdGuard Filters is an open-source project that is used by different content blockers and we welcome contributions. If you have some technical knowledge about how websites work, you are welcome to create a pull request following [these instructions](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md).

comment.body:
This issue has been automatically marked as stale because it has been open for 10 days with no activity.
Unfortunately, our resources are limited and we can not always take the time to respond to requests about websites that are not popular enough. The issue will be closed if no further activity occurs.
Please note, that AdGuard Filters is an open-source project that is used by different content blockers and we welcome contributions. If you have some technical knowledge about how websites work, you are welcome to create a pull request following [these instructions](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md).

comment.body:
> They are load balancing between `aa.tweakers.net` and `ab.tweakers.net`.

`aa.tweakers.nl` are inline banners (if you click on it, it will keep you on tweakers). `ab.tweakers.nl` will redirect you via tweakers to a 3p and are the real ads.

issue.body:
We have rules to block new type of ads, but if that does not help, follow the instruction below.
Please enable AdGuard Extra in AdGuard settings (for app users).

---

Browser extension users should to install `AdGuard Extra` script into `Tampermonkey` extension.

`AdGuard Extra` download link:
https://userscripts.adtidy.org/beta/adguard-extra/1.0/adguard-extra.user.js

comment.body:
As far as I understand, `aa.tweakers.nl` is also used to downloads/loads banners from `ab.tweakers.nl`, so even if blocking it causes that some firsty party ads/banners do not load, then I would prefer to keep it blocked (blocking it also fixes ad leftovers and these first-party banners are loaded only sometimes).

<details><summary>Screenshot</summary>

![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/29142494/171686094-9e5943f3-a51f-4dc9-95bb-1dddc1ecac68.png)

</details>

And it looks like that some links with `aa.tweakers.nl` also redirect to third-party websites:
```
https://aa.tweakers.nl/raylene//sl3087/dtdesktop/ogcontrol/IIddc9a6c7-2d0e-464c-98e3-5503ce40fad0/tlall/vpunknown/tabioware/tagaming/tagames/taelectronic_arts/cnNL/uuihSGnhNWwW8qPthXRwYi/ffnone/bnelectronic_arts/bnbioware/kwgames/kwgaming/im14_197480/im23_331354/im23_1175072/pstop1/ingames/ingaming/inbioware/inelectronic_arts/cagames/A2ihSGnhNWwW8qPthXRwYi/ad2380-155/URhttps://www.bcc.nl/shop/lister?fh_location=%2F%2Fcatalog01%2Fnl_NL%2F%24s%3Dhp%5Cu002015S%2F!filiaalstatuscode%3DX%2F!filiaalstatuscode%3DO%2Fspecbcc5628%3E%7B256%7D&search=hp%2015S#specbcc5628&utm_source=tweakers&utm_medium=display&utm_campaign=6788_hp_jma
```

### Issue URL (Annoyance) [https://pelisplus.one/](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fpelisplus.one%2F) ### Comment > Doesnt block bet365 , keeps showing no matter what . Show separate window all the time for bet 365 site. I block all widows from bet365 but site still showing after all. More than 20 times i block and doesnt work. I keep filter copy on notepad , just in case i have to use another device or in case of update browser extensions. I did AdGuard update , i mean, off and on /unable and able/ again today 02/06/2022 using Edge. Other devices (desktop computer and tablet) show same problem with bet365 site. > English not mi first language, sorry and thanks in advance . Happy birthday and great work , keep this way!!! ### Screenshots

issue.title: yandex.ru

labels.name: Extra
labels.description: Issues, related to AdGuard Extra extension

labels.name: A: Problematic
labels.description: Issues, which cannot be resolved easily

issue.body:
### ВНИМАНИЕ

Пользователям программы для `Windows`, `macOS` или `Android` нужно включить расширение `AdGuard Extra` в настройках программы.

---

Пользователям браузерного расширения нужно установить [расширение AdGuard Extra](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdGuardExtra#how-to-install-adguard-extra) либо скрипт `AdGuard Extra`(этот вариант может не везде срабатыавать). 

<details><summary>Установка скрипта  "AdGuard Extra" в расширение "Tampermonkey"  :</summary>

Для установки скрипта понадобится браузерное расширение-скриптоприёмник `Tampermonkey`

Ссылка на `AdGuard Extra`
https://userscripts.adtidy.org/beta/adguard-extra/1.0/adguard-extra.user.js

После установки скрипта нужно будет зайти в настройки `Tampermonkey`, включить режим эксперта, переключить режим встраивания на `мгновенный` и перезапустить расширение:
![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/8361299/62641343-07248e00-b94c-11e9-9775-9854a7922889.png)

![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/8361299/62641299-f7a54500-b94b-11e9-8a83-885d89abbeec.png)

</details>

comment.body:
This issue has been automatically marked as stale because it has been open for 10 days with no activity.
Unfortunately, our resources are limited and we can not always take the time to respond to requests about websites that are not popular enough. The issue will be closed if no further activity occurs.
Please note, that AdGuard Filters is an open-source project that is used by different content blockers and we welcome contributions. If you have some technical knowledge about how websites work, you are welcome to create a pull request following [these instructions](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md).

issue.body:
